name: PHIL UNICOMB AVIATION PTY LTD
about: Phil Unicomb Aviation Pty Ltd is a reputable flying school based in New South Wales, Australia, operating from both Taree and Cessnock bases. We specialize in professional flight training, offering programs from recreational to advanced levels. Our philosophy is built on providing top-notch instruction, robust safety practices, and a student-centric culture. Led by Phil Unicomb, the Head of Operations, we ensure a comprehensive and supportive learning environment. We are an approved remote base for the Manning River Aero Club Part 141 Certificate, adhering to the highest standards set by the Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA). Our commitment to safety and excellence makes us a trusted choice for aspiring pilots. We pride ourselves on helping students achieve their aviation goals with confidence and skill.
services:
["Recreational Pilot’s License (RPL)
Private Pilot’s License (PPL)
Commercial Pilots License (CPL)
Flight Review
Flight Tests & Examination
Theory Courses"]
